alert.note: Alert for Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Los Angeles County Beaches (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 06 at 11:54AM PST until January 08 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST MONDAY REPLACING THE BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 5 to 9 feet with dangerous rip currents. * WHERE...Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands and Los Angeles County Beaches. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...There is an increased risk of ocean drowning. Rip currents can pull swimmers and surfers out to sea. Waves can wash people off beaches and rocks, and capsize small boats nearshore.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions, or stay near occupied lifeguard towers. Rock jetties can be deadly in such conditions, stay off the rocks.

area.areaDesc: Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Los Angeles County Beaches
